title: "Microsoft AI tool enables ‘extremely large’ models with a trillion parameters"
excerpt: "Announced in February, it has already gone through multiple iterations that increased the maximum size of the models it can train from more than 100 billion to more than a trillion. At a high level, parameters can be thought of as the insights that an AI learns from processing data."
